item.title: The DCU Gets The Perfect Flash Reboot With Popular Casting Choices For Barry Allen & Reverse-Flash In Stunning Art
item.description: While the status of The Flash in James Gunn's DC Universe is unclear, new artwork sets up the ideal reboot for Barry Allen and the Reverse-Flash.

item.title: Flight Risk Cast & Character Guide: Who Stars In Mark Wahlberg's Thriller
item.description: Mark Wahlberg's new high-stakes thriller movie Flight Risk, directed by Academy Award winner Mel Gibson, features a small but strong cast.

item.title: 10 Martial Arts Movies To Watch If You Love Enter The Dragon
item.description: While Bruce Lee's Enter the Dragon has earned its spot among the best kung fu movies ever, plenty more films echo that martial arts classic's appeal.
